Package icyllis.modernui.graphics.font

    icyllis.modernui.graphics

  • Class
    Description
    BakedGlyph
    This class holds information for a glyph about its pre-rendered image in a GPU texture.
    GLFontAtlas
    Maintains a font texture atlas, which is specified with a font strike (style and size).
    GlyphManager
    Manages all glyphs, font atlases, measures glyph metrics and draw them of different sizes and styles, and upload them to generated OpenGL textures.
    GlyphManager.AtlasInvalidationInfo
    Called when atlas resize or evict entries
